name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud
display_name: ðŸŒ€ Vibe Landing Zone â€” IBM Cloud Edition
description: Deploy a live Vibe Landing Zone with IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite) and optional IBM Cloud Code Engine for push-to-COS and staging/triggering Project updates.

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region (e.g., us-south). Usually inferred from Project.

variables.name: project_id
variables.description: (Optional) Project ID. Auto-detected when deployed via IBM Cloud Projects.

variables.name: resource_group_id
variables.description: (Optional) Resource Group ID. Auto-detected when deployed via IBM Cloud Projects.

variables.name: config_id
variables.description: (Required) The Configuration ID from the Project URL or CLI. See docs.

variables.name: enable_code_engine
variables.description: Enable IBM Cloud Code Engine integration.

outputs.name: primaryoutputlink
outputs.description: Public website URL for your deployed vibe app.

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_name
outputs.description: COS bucket name created for your deployment.

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_crn
outputs.description: COS bucket CRN for reference and governance.
